org.siframework.abbi.atom
Class XML

java.lang.Object
  org.siframework.abbi.atom.XML

public class XML
extends java.lang.Object

XML is a utility class to convert Feeds to XML and back.

Returns:

                    throws java.text.ParseException,
                           java.net.URISyntaxException
Convert an XML DOM Document into a Feed

Parameters:
d - The document to convert
Returns:
The feed resulting from the conversion
Throws:
java.text.ParseException - If timestamps are incorrectly formatted.
java.net.URISyntaxException - If a URI is incorrectly formatted.
